tool_description: Filters review content for inappropriate language, profanity, hate speech, and other offensive content using natural language processing.

review_text.description: Review text to filter for inappropriate content

error_messages: Empty review text: Review text cannot be empty or null
Unsupported language: Language code not supported by the filtering system
Invalid filter level: Use one of [mild, moderate, strict]
Text too long: Review text exceeds maximum processing length
usage: Pass review text to check for inappropriate language. Specify language_code and filter_level for customized filtering sensitivity.

contains_profanity.description: Whether profanity was detected in the text

filtered_text.description: Review text with inappropriate content marked or removed
